did.unittitle: Mark Lillian Collection of Roosevelt Hospital (NYC) vs. Local 1199, 1962 Representational Dispute Documents,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers relating to the 1962 Representational Dispute between Roosevelt Hospital, in New York City, and Local 1199.

scopecontent.p: Papers relating to the 1962 Representational Dispute between Roosevelt Hospital, in New York City, and Local 1199.
These documents were donated by Mark Lillian, graduate of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.

controlaccess.corpname: National Union of Hospital and Nursing Home Employees. Local 1199 Drug & Hospital Union (New York, N.Y.)
